articles.title: Google Podcasts Shutting Down Next Year Search Giant To Kill Podcasting App In April 2024; Migration Tool Announced - Jagran English
articles.description: Google Podcasts App: According to a Google support page now removed cited by Ars Technica, the product will die in April 2024. The next bet to ace the podcasting race is on YouTube Music and Podcasts, which debuted in 2022.
articles.content: Google Podcasts Shutting Down: Search giant Google announced that Google Podcasts is set for an exit next year in September this year. While the company did not confirm the month of shutdown earlier,… [+2025 chars]
